verbs.description: [V: smoked] [ARG1: salmon] new potatoes give twice - baked potatoes a rest this year and try these stuffed spuds smoked salmon and cream cheese blended with lemon juice and dill are simply piped into small red potatoes leftovers are even good with eggs for breakfast —taste of home test kitchen
